segment.source: UWP on Xbox One
segment.target: UWP on Xbox One

segment.source: How to build apps for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) on Xbox One.
segment.target: How to build apps for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) on Xbox One.

segment.source: UWP on Xbox One
segment.target: UWP on Xbox One

segment.source: Get started building apps for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) on Xbox One.
segment.target: Get started building apps for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP) on Xbox One.

segment.source: This preview release supports developing both apps and games.
segment.target: This preview release supports developing both apps and games.

segment.source: You don't need to be an ID@Xbox developer to experiment, create, and test games or apps on Xbox, but you do need to enroll with ID@Xbox if you want to publish and sell a game on Xbox One or take advantage of Xbox Live on Windows 10.
segment.target: You don't need to be an ID@Xbox developer to experiment, create, and test games or apps on Xbox, but you do need to enroll with ID@Xbox if you want to publish and sell a game on Xbox One or take advantage of Xbox Live on Windows 10.

segment.source: To join our community of independent developers and enthusiasts, register for ID@Xbox.
segment.target: To join our community of independent developers and enthusiasts, register for ID@Xbox.

segment.source: This section includes setup steps, a guide through the authentication process, information about installing the required versions of Visual Studio and Windows 10 tools, and the steps to build, run, and debug your first simple application.
segment.target: This section includes setup steps, a guide through the authentication process, information about installing the required versions of Visual Studio and Windows 10 tools, and the steps to build, run, and debug your first simple application.

segment.source: Samples
segment.target: Samples

segment.source: Pointer to the github location – TVHelpers - where you will find useful XAML and JavaScript samples to get you started developing for Xbox.
segment.target: Pointer to the github location – TVHelpers - where you will find useful XAML and JavaScript samples to get you started developing for Xbox.

segment.source: Samples include a full XAML Media App template as well as automatic controller navigation, rich media playback, and search for web-based technologies.
segment.target: Samples include a full XAML Media App template as well as automatic controller navigation, rich media playback, and search for web-based technologies.
